title: 7 Days to Die A12.4 (64-bit Windows) Gamematrix.tk
description:
This is the Alpha 12.4 version. Cracked originally by 3DMGAME and adapted to 12.4 by Gamematrix. Ready to play!

Although for some odd reason the torrent shows 1 seeder for a long time, not only am I seeding this from a dedicated server (1gbit up/down) there are also several other seeders.

For those who have this version and want to play online, you're welcome to join our server at:

Server: gamematrix.tk or 198.50.154.222 port 26900

The info is also posted on the website at gamematrix.tk

We also highly recommend using Teamspeak at the same IP in order to team up with other players and get the news and the newest version!

Open 24/7, Full PVP with air drops and a lot of zombies and bears!

We have banned and will continue to ban all cheaters permanently from the server, this version has helped protect against cheating very well.

===========================================
PLEASE DO NOT FORGET TO

Change your USERNAME and STEAMACCOUNTID on the 3DMGAME.INI file located in the game folder in order to avoid issues while joining servers.
SteamAccountID must be changed TO A RANDOM NUMBER BETWEEN 1 AND 4294967295 (WE RECOMMEND A HIGH NUMBER TO AVOID GETTING THE SAME ID AS SOMEONE ELSE)

===========================================

PLEASE SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS AND BUY THE GAME IF YOU LIKE IT AND CAN AFFORD IT! IT TRULY IS A MASTERPIECE IN THE MAKING AND WE HAVE BOUGHT MANY COPIES ALREADY!

WE OFFER THE CRACKED SERVER SO THOSE LESS FORTUNATE CAN ALSO ENJOY THE GAME!


Enjoy!
